meanings.definition: Failure to understand or interpret correctly.
meanings.sent1: Her miscomprehension of the math problem led to a wrong answer.
meanings.sent2: The miscomprehension of the instructions caused confusion in the class.
meanings.sent3: His miscomprehension of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The miscomprehension of the situation painted a different picture in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The miscomprehension of the concept left her puzzled for days.

meanings.sent1: The miscomprehension of the story's ending left her surprised.
meanings.sent2: His miscomprehension of the map led them in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent3: The miscomprehension of the recipe made the dish taste strange.
meanings.sent4: Their miscomprehension of the rules caused them to lose the game.
meanings.sent5: The miscomprehension of the message resulted in a mix-up.
